Package ver14.SharedClasses.Game

Enum Class Location

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<Location>
ver14.SharedClasses.Game.Location
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Location>, Constable
public enum Location extends Enum<Location>
Location - an enum consisting of 64 values representing all 64 squares on the board. used to access squares on the board an enum is used for performance reasons.

      public static Location getLoc​(Location loc, Direction direction)
      Gets the location relative to loc in the direction
      Parameters:
      loc - the loc
      direction - the direction
      Returns:

    • getLoc

      public static Location getLoc​(Location loc, int numOfMult, Direction direction)
      Gets the location relative to loc in the direction given and the distance is determined by the numOfMult
      Parameters:
      loc - the loc
      numOfMult - the num of mult
      direction - the direction
      Returns:
      the location if the calculated index is inside the bounds(0...63). null otherwise

    • getLoc

      public static Location getLoc​(Location loc, int add)
      Gets the location that is exactly add squares from loc NOTE: add should be in bitboard format
      Parameters:
      loc - the loc
      add - the number of squares to add
      Returns:
      the location if the calculated index is inside the bounds(0...63). null otherwise
      See Also:
      Bitboard
